description:
Wrap yourself in comfort and warmth. The thigh-length Kiruna Padded Parka offers shelter from cold Canadian winters. Its durable G-1000 fabric stands up to wind and rain, and you can add extra Greenland Wax to keep it holding strong through storm after storm. A two-way zipper makes it easy to sit down when the bus finally shows up.

  • Hardwearing G-1000 material is impregnated with fluorocarbon-free wax for better protection from the elements
  • Lined with soft nylon
  • Adjustable hood keeps you warm and dry
  • G-Loft Supreme insulation traps a layer of warm air between the liner and rugged outer layer, insulating you from the elements
  • 2-way zipper helps keep the heat in
  • Tons of pocket space to bring along all your necessities, and even some of your nice-to-haves
  • Adjustable snaps at the cuffs and a drawcord at the hem keep the cold out and warm in
name: Fjallraven Kiruna Padded Parka - Women's
